00022 #ifndef TAGLIB_XMPROPERTIES_H
00023 #define TAGLIB_XMPROPERTIES_H
00024 
00025 #include "taglib.h"
00026 #include "tstring.h"
00027 #include "audioproperties.h"
00028 
00029 namespace TagLib {
00030   namespace XM {
00031     class Properties : public AudioProperties {
00032       friend class File;
00033     public:
00035       enum {
00036         LinearFreqTable = 1 // otherwise its the amiga freq. table
00037       };
00038 
00039       Properties(AudioProperties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle);
00040       virtual ~Properties();
00041 
00042       int length()     const;
00043       int bitrate()    const;
00044       int sampleRate() const;
00045       int channels()   const;
00046 
00047       ushort lengthInPatterns() const;
00048       ushort version()          const;
00049       ushort restartPosition()  const;
00050       ushort patternCount()     const;
00051       ushort instrumentCount()  const;
00052       uint   sampleCount()      const;
00053       ushort flags()            const;
00054       ushort tempo()            const;
00055       ushort bpmSpeed()         const;
00056 
00057       void setChannels(int channels);
00058 
00059       void setLengthInPatterns(ushort lengthInPatterns);
00060       void setVersion(ushort version);
00061       void setRestartPosition(ushort restartPosition);
00062       void setPatternCount(ushort patternCount);
00063       void setInstrumentCount(ushort instrumentCount);
00064       void setSampleCount(uint sampleCount);
00065       void setFlags(ushort flags);
00066       void setTempo(ushort tempo);
00067       void setBpmSpeed(ushort bpmSpeed);
00068 
00069     private:
00070       Properties(const Properties&);
00071       Properties &operator=(const Properties&);
00072 
00073       class PropertiesPrivate;
00074       PropertiesPrivate *d;
00075     };
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 #endif
